name: Botify AI: Create. Chat. Bot.
description:
Create your virtual personas for engaging conversations.

Make your own version of Elon Musk more weird or less interplanetary by infusing your own set of personality characteristics and values. Talk about the meaning of life with Jesus or Buddha. Share secrets with Marilyn Monroe and conspire with Che Guevara.

Liberate your soul and unlock forbidden topics. Rejoice in deep and entertaining conversations.
